item.title: A reminder on how NOT to do software development.
item.description: Sometimes (or a lot of times) we developers loose the way to the green hills of the finished and polished products...
item.dc:creator: alex

item.title: Some answers to the Devil Framework, the Universe and Everything.
item.description: Last week I've received an email with an interesting set of questions about the Devil Framework and I've learned that all email posted by our mail server is considered spam by Yahoo!. If you want to know if 42 is one of the answers, continue reading....
item.dc:creator: alex

item.title: Atomic Batteries Included
item.description: Yes, we will deliver the Devil Framework with a full set of atomic batteries included...
item.dc:creator: alex

item.title: HyperCard, Python, Views and a little sip of Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster (be careful...)
item.description: Been a big fan of HyperCard, it's not so strange I ended up implementing my own reinterpretation of it for the Devil Framework. Lets take a look....
item.dc:creator: alex

item.title: What happens when Python remembers me that programming is fun?
item.description: During last month I've been having fun developing two new plugins for the Devil Framework: an extensible IDE and a web application server/front-end. Here come some thoughts about the IDE stuff....
item.dc:creator: alex

item.title: DLNetSNMP added to Pypi
item.description: Just a note to say that I've added version 0.4 of DLNetSNMP to the Python Index. If interested you can find more information and the dowloadable files at the new DLNetSNMP home page. In this release a lot of serious bugs were fixed and a simple installation script added so you'll not need to perform manual changes in the code anymore.
item.dc:creator: root

item.title: A new version of the DLNetSNMP (Python ctypes wrapper for NetSNMP)
item.description: Just a small bug-fix update. Now it seems to work correctly. Be carefull in using it with threads, as the underling NetSNMP library is not thread-safe. The code: DLNetSNMP-0.2.tar.gz
item.dc:creator: alex

item.title: A small (but complete) Python ctypes-based Net-SNMP wrapper module.
item.description: Being fed up with the Net-SNMP wrapper we were using in the Devil Framework, I've written my own version, and learned something on the way (code included).
item.dc:creator: alex
